replies.bodyText: We are missing a convenient abstraction for that, which is going to complicate it for you and any non-maven/gradle tool. For Maven projects we do that in BuildFileMojoBase (look how we initialize platformDescr). In Gradle that would be QuarkusPlatformTask.platformDescriptor().
replies.author: aloubyansky

replies.bodyText: I see, yes it is a bit difficult on the CLI side since the project can be either Maven/Gradle. Some moons ago I used BuildFile/BuildTool to try to figure out what it was. If we could have a fairly simple way to do that it would be helpful for the CLI.
